segments.text: just don't understand why we have to take the subway . Look at this place . It's modern enough . But it's far from lively .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's convenient . People in network go everywhere by subway if they don't drive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This isn't network , Frida . We are in San Francisco .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We haven't come here in business but for pleasure . We should go out exciting . What can you see in the subway ? Nothing !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What can you see from a tram or a double-decker ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can see people who are walking on the sidewalk . I can see cars driving on the streets . I can see the sun shining and beautiful flowers dancing in the wind . I can even smell the scent of flowers and the freshness of the air .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But they are not as convenient as the subway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You miss the point ! We are not in a hurry to go anywhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , maybe you are right . We'll be more amused in a tram or a double-decker than on the subway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so glad you can finally see things in my way . Can we leave this dull place now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about the tickets ? I've already bought them .
segments.speaker: S2
